alert.note: Alert for Casper Mountain; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations; Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 27 at 8:04PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Area of Snow moving East... This is a special weather statement from the National Weather Service Office in Riverton. * WHAT...A 25 to 40 mile wide area of light to moderate snow was moving east northeast around 30 mph. A quick inch of snow is possible. This line was orientated from southwest to northeast. * WHERE...Southeast Fremont, Natrona County into southern Johnson County. * WHEN...Kaycee and Waltman around 830 PM, Natrona about 9 PM, and Casper between 10 and 11 PM. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Visibilities will be under a half mile at times. Motorists should be prepared for rapidly changing visibility and roads becoming slick and hazardous.

area.areaDesc: Casper Mountain; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations; Southeast Johnson County
